description:
Description
This is a hypothetical universe of schools in a given territorial unit,
patterned off the apipop data available in the survey package.
title: Hypothetical (Fake) Data on Academic Performance
reference: These data were generated for a blog post on my website.

parameters.county: a character vector for the county, named after an Ohio State All-American. “County” incidence is weighted by how many All-American honors the Ohio State player had. It's my fake data. You make your own if you have a problem with it.
parameters.schooltype: a character vector for school type. E = elementary school. M = middle school. H = high school
parameters.e: a numeric vector for random errors
parameters.api: a numeric vector vector an academic performance index for the school
parameters.meals: a numeric vector for the percentage of school students eligible for subsidized meals
parameters.colgrad: a numeric vector for the percentage of school parents with college degrees
parameters.uid: a numeric vector as a unique identifier for schools
parameters.community: a character vector for the school's community, either rural, suburban, or urban.
parameters.sbase: a numeric vector for some base differences between schools, patterned off the school type means for api00 in the apipop data.
parameters.fullqual: a numeric vector for the percentage of the school with teachers that are fully qualified
parameters.cbase: a numeric vector for some base differences between counties, randomly drawn from a uniform distribution

format: A data frame with 10000 observations on the following 8 variables.
